instructions: In a conversation, rotate iPhone to landscape orientation. Tap the Handwriting button on the keyboard. Write a message with your finger or choose a saved message at the bottom, then tap Done. Tap the Send button to send your message or the Remove button to cancel.

After you type a message, press the Send button (touch and hold the Send button on models without 3D Touch ). Tap the choices to preview different bubble effects. Tip: Want to send a personal message? When you use invisible ink, the message remains blurred until the recipient swipes to reveal it. Choose the effect you want, then tap the Send button to send your message.

After you type a message, press the Send button (touch and hold the Send button on models without 3D Touch ). Tap Screen, then swipe left or right to preview different screen effects. Choose the effect you want, then tap the Send button to send the message or the Remove button to cancel.
